reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major arthritis subtypes: osteoarthritis (~10-15 per 100k), rheumatoid arthritis (~1-2), gout (~2-4), and other inflammatory arthritides including psoriatic arthritis, ankylosing spondylitis, and lupus-related arthritis (~3-8) = ~35 per 100k incidence. Low confidence due to wide variation across subtypes and significant geographic differences in disease prevalence.
